title: White People Renovating Houses
description: Randy and Sharon Marsh are a husband and wife team renovating houses in their neighborhood.
quote: What weâ€™re thinking here is taking out the wall between the kitchen and the living room to give you an open concept with space to entertain.
altHero: Randy Marsh with toolbelt and goggles describing his vision to clients in their kitchen
alt1: Randy and Sharon Marsh standing outside a house that has recently sold
alt2: Randy taking a sledge-hammer to a house post
alt3: Randy sharing his vision with another set of clients in their kitchen
alt4: a couple look on as Randy sledge-hammers a hole in their ceiling
